Heading: Number of victims

Value: Indian River County (Majority were in Vero Beach)

Problems in school?
Value: He flunked gym class every year

Heading: Teased while in school?
Value: No but people say he was not popular.

Heading: Age of first sexual experience
Value: Either 18 or 19 and watched Fred rape his sister, Wendy.

Value: Assistant Librarian at Vero Beach Land

Heading: Grades in school
Value: Failed gym class 4 years in a row

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: Gas station attendant, caretaker of orchards.

Time in forensic hospital (prior to killing)?
Committed previous crimes?
Value: Yes. Found guilty of armed trespassing. Burglary

Heading: Spend time in prison?
Value: Yes. Sentenced to five years. Got out in one. Then spent 137 days in half-way house

Value: 6 were killed, with a possibility of 5 others escaping

Value: Hisang Huang Ling, 48; Ying Hua Ling, 17; Judy Kay Daley, 35; Angelica Lavallee, 14; Barbara Ann Byer, 14; Lynn Elliot, 17; Hisang Huang Ling, 48; Ying Hua Ling, 17; Judy Kay Daley, 35; Angelica Lavallee, 14; Barbara Ann Byer, 14; Lynn Elliot, 17

Heading: Weapon
Value: Brought his own, handcuffs and rope

Heading: Location of killing
Value: Remote Areas and Gore’s parent’s home.

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?

Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Cut-op and disposed of
Value: Yes. In a swamp for the gators and put them in oil drums

Heading: Did killer plead NGRI?
Value: No but has been through a long process of appealing his sentences.

Heading: Did serial killer confess?
Value: Yes. But not about everything. More confessions came after he was incarcerated.
